author: jwasinger
content: one reason we should have the block access lists present in the blockchain tests: it triggers the parallel execution path.  It would be nice to test this without having to run the consume tests through hive locally

author: jwasinger
content: although, it's also good to test the execution path that doesn't parallelize

author: jwasinger
content: and the blockchain test runner can be modified to execute the tests twice, the second time importing blocks containing BALs that were just built
